Ideas and features can mean a lot of different things; I do not have a particular template to fill out. Please delete all of the text in this template and replace with a description of what you're thinking. It's okay if your thoughts are more exploratory and uncertain OR more concrete. Some topics you might touch on, depending on the nature of the idea:

- Is this solving an issue or pain point for you? Is there some other motivation for this?
- Is some discovery needed on technical feasibility or do you have a clear idea of how the feature would work?
- Are there multiple alternatives to choose between?
- Are there any open questions?
